snippet: The Day: Letitia Baldrige, who died on Monday, may have had some thoughts on how people should behave during and after Hurricane Sandy. She had them for other crises, so why not this one?
abstract: The Day: Letitia Baldrige, who died on Monday, may have had some thoughts on how people should behave during and after Hurricane Sandy. She had them for other crises, so why not this one?

headline.main: Graceful Words of Wisdom From an Expert on Etiquette
